text: - Gait ataxia - Hyperactivity - Impaired smooth pursuit - Impulsivity - Intention tremor - Mental deterioration - Neurodegeneration - Neurofibrillary tangles - Nystagmus - Optic atrophy - Phenotypic variability - Progressive - Seizures - Short attention span - Spasticity - Talipes calcaneovalgus - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
